query:
-- Fix Access Pass (one-time only, $27 founding / $47 regular)
UPDATE membershipTiers 
SET priceOneTime = 4700,
    foundingPriceOneTime = 2700,
    priceMonthly = 0,
    foundingPriceMonthly = 0
WHERE slug = 'access_pass';

-- Fix Workshop ($97 one-time, was $197)
UPDATE membershipTiers 
SET priceOneTime = 9700,
    foundingPriceOneTime = 19700,
    priceMonthly = 0,
    foundingPriceMonthly = 0
WHERE slug = 'workshop';

-- Fix Starter ($97/month founding, was $147/month regular)
UPDATE membershipTiers 
SET priceMonthly = 14700,
    foundingPriceMonthly = 9700,
    priceOneTime = 0,
    foundingPriceOneTime = 0,
    workshopTokensPerMonth = 2
WHERE slug = 'starter';

-- Fix Lite ($300/month founding, was $397/month regular)
UPDATE membershipTiers 
SET priceMonthly = 39700,
    foundingPriceMonthly = 30000,
    priceOneTime = 0,
    foundingPriceOneTime = 0
WHERE slug = 'lite';
